## FormattingFeatures type

Represents the formatting options.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FormattingFeatures = {
    $type?: string;
    AccessibilityLevel?: number;
    DisallowedActions?: Array<string>;
    DisallowedStyles?: Array<string>;
    DocType?: string;
};
```
